sentences.en: "Lange" wants to create more refulgent tomorrow in the field of decoration.
sentences.cn: “兰格”在装饰领域要创造更加辉煌的明天。

sentences.en: Answer: Anyone can use a happy feeling to wish a refulgent result.
sentences.cn: 答：任何人都可以用幸福的心情期待辉煌的成果。

sentences.en: Middle East has declined since modern era, however it had possessed of refulgent history.
sentences.cn: 中东地区曾有过辉煌的历史，只是在近代以来衰落了。

sentences.en: The development and progress of sentiment-area need your support! I hope that all of us will get together to build sentiment-area more refulgent ! thank you!
sentences.cn: 情感区的发展和进步需要你们的帮助！我希望我们能一起把情感区建设得更加辉煌！谢谢！
